p: There was no difference in the blood concentration of selenium at 28 days in the children who consumed milk from cows fed the CON, OIL, or SM diets. The children who consumed milk from cows fed the CON and SM diets had similar blood vitamin E concentrations at 28 ( p = 0.001) days. However, at 84 days, the blood concentrations of vitamin E in children who consumed milk from cows fed the COANT and OANT diets were higher than in those who consumed milk from cows fed the OIL and SM diets ( p = 0.001).
